Question: Shenzhen Ssa Electronic Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen SSA Electronic Co., Ltd

P18 Portable Monitor

- 15.6 Inch USB Type C Portable Display
- USB Gaming Monitor with Type C HDMI for Laptop PC Phone
- New design super thin for gaming
- Certification from FRAMEO
- 2G DDR / 64GB Memory
- 2.4G/5G/Wifi 6
- Picture Transfer Speed Faster
